amendment.description: To provide for an increase and a decrease in funding for certain programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2845 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2845 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2671-2673; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2671) To provide for an increase and a decrease in funding for certain programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2845 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2845 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Lugar.
